author: Vitaly Alekseyev
description: Earl Grey tea, dry sherry and sherry vinegar combine with the aged rum to produce a very interesting drink. Earl Grey flavours linger on the finish.
name: Big Fish

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
<strong>*Special ingredient #1<strong>: Earl Grey syrup made with 20g Dilmah Earl Grey tea, 1l boiling water and 600g caster sugar
